launchpad_s_plus

Class Padmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • launchpad_s_plus.Padmap

  • public class Padmap
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a pad map continaing the values needed to determine positions of the Launchpad S pads
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion

    • Method Detail

      • getxposition

        public static int getxposition(int value,
                               boolean isCC)
        Returns X position based on the integer value given
        Parameters:
        value - MIDI value of the position
        isCC - True if the key is a MIDI Control Change
        Returns:
        X position

      • getyposition

        public static int getyposition(int value,
                               boolean isCC)
        Returns Y position based on the integer value given
        Parameters:
        value - MIDI value of the position
        isCC - True if the key is a MIDI Control Change
        Returns:
        X position

      • setPadmap

        public void setPadmap()
        Sets the integer values of the Midi notes for every pad.
        These values will be used by DisplayPad.java to determine what Midi Message to send
